meanings.definition: Inflammation of the pleura, characterized by difficulty breathing and chest pain.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with pleurisies after she complained of chest pain and trouble breathing.
meanings.sent2: Pleurisies can make it hard to take deep breaths and cause discomfort in the chest.
meanings.sent3: Despite the seriousness of pleurisies, she joked that it felt like a tiny monster was sitting on her chest.

meanings.sent5: The sharp, stabbing pain of pleurisies made each breath a struggle, like trying to inhale through a straw.
